thread.title: BRIEF-Union Bank Of The Philippines Says Acquisition Of Preferred Shares Of World Bank’S International Finance Corp In PR Savings Bank Still Under Negotiation‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Union Bank Of The Philippines Says Acquisition Of Preferred Shares Of World Bank’S International Finance Corp In PR Savings Bank Still Under Negotiation‍​
text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Union Bank Of The Philippines:
* ACQUISITION OF PREFERRED SHARES OF WORLD BANK’S INTERNATIONAL FINANCE CORP IN PR SAVINGS BANK STILL UNDER NEGOTIATION‍​
* CO REFERS TO NEWS ARTICLE “CITY SAVINGS BUYING OUT IFC IN PR SAVINGS BANK” POSTED IN THE PHILIPPINE STAR (INTERNET EDITION) ON JAN 12, 2018‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
